title: When I Reincarnated as the Villainess, I Raised Yuri Flags with the Heroine!? - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Dense Protagonist   Maids   Multiple POV   Otome Game   Reincarnated in a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Satellite   Satera Ito   さてら☆いと   寒寺絃
description:
The protagonist was a normal high school girl. One day, she was reborn as the villainess marquis’ daughter, Rosalind Stanley, who appeared in an otome game. While living to avoid the tragic fate that meets Rosalind in the game, somehow she raised the heroine’s flags.

“Kuh… Cute! Such cuteness!? Is this the charm of an otome game heroine!?”

Could this perhaps be a yuri development!? Even though there was no yuri component in the game!?

However, as the heroine was cute, it couldn’t be helped. The villainess enters the yuri route!
>
